帶.definition: band; belt; girdle; ribbon; tire; area; zone; region; CL:條|条[tiao2]; to wear; to carry; to take along; to bear (i.e. to have); to lead; to bring; to look after; to raise

帶上門.definition: to close the door (when going through it)

帶來.definition: to bring; (fig.) to bring about; to produce

帶分數.definition: mixed fraction; mixed number (i.e. with an integer part and a fraction part, e.g. four and three quarters); see also: improper fraction 假分數|假分数[jia3 fen1 shu4] and proper fraction 真分數|真分数[zhen1 fen1 shu4]

帶動.definition: to spur; to provide impetus; to drive

帶娃.definition: to look after a baby; to take care of a young child

帶子.definition: belt; band; ribbon; strap; girdle; (coll.) audio or video tape; Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri); comb pen shell (Atrina pectinata)

帶孩子.definition: to look after a baby; to take care of a young child

帶感.definition: (neologism) (of movies, songs etc) affecting; touching; moving; (of a person, esp. a woman) charming; cool

帶有.definition: to have as a feature or characteristic; to have an element of (confidence, sweetness, malevolence etc); to carry (a pathogen, connotation etc)

帶氣.definition: carbonated (drink); sparkling (mineral water); to display annoyance; to be dissatisfied

帶牛佩犢.definition: to abandon armed struggle and return to raising cattle (idiom)

帶病.definition: to be suffering from an illness (often implying "in spite of being sick"); to carry the causative agent of an infectious disease

帶種.definition: (coll.) to have character; to have guts; plucky

帶累.definition: to get sb involved in one's trouble; Taiwan pr. [dai4 lei4]

帶給.definition: to give to; to provide to; to bring to; to take to

帶薪.definition: to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc); paid (leave); on full pay

帶路.definition: to lead the way; to guide; to show the way; (fig.) to instruct

帶過.definition: to give sth only cursory attention; to treat sth as not very significant

帶隊.definition: to lead a team; to lead a group; group leader; (tourism) tour guide

帶電.definition: to be electrified; to be charged; to be live

帶頭.definition: to take the lead; to be the first; to set an example
